src/lib/db/schema/example.ts.description: Schema files use pgTable from drizzle-orm/pg-core with serial primary keys, and export types using $inferSelect (Example) and $inferInsert (NewExample) patterns for type-safe database operations.

src/lib/db/client.ts.description: Database client uses aliased imports (e.g., 'neon as createSqlClient') to maintain provider-agnostic naming throughout the codebase, following Dependency Inversion Principle.
